title: Jenna Dewan shows off her blossoming bump as she attends the Power Women Summit in Santa Monica
text:
She is currently pregnant with her second child - her first with beau Stave Kazee.

And Jenna Dewan looked absolutely glowing as she attended the TheWrap's Power Women Summit at Fairmont Miramar Hotel in Santa Monica on Friday.

The actress, 39, showed off her style credentials in a chic zipped bodysuit with a tartan high-waisted skirt.

Radiant: Pregnant Jenna Dewan, 39, looked absolutely glowing as she attended the TheWrap's Power Women Summit at Fairmont Miramar Hotel in Santa Monica on Friday

The plunging number perfectly showed off her sensational decolletage and she boosted her height in a pair of strappy black heels.

Jenna added to her look with a chic, structured blazer and accessorised with drop silver earrings.

The beauty enhanced her striking features with a glamorous coat of contoured make-up and sported her brunette locks in subtle tousled waves falling into a side-parting.

Jenna recently gushed about her new Tony-award winning beau Steve, telling US Weekly that she was left in tears after meeting him for the first time.

Looking good: The actress showed off her style credentials in a chic zipped bodysuit with a tartan high-waisted skirt

'He was in a show called Once on Broadway, seven years ago, and I went to see the show, and I was blown away by him and his talent, crying my eyes out.

'And I took my mom, and we got to meet him. ‘Oh, my God, you were amazing!’”

Following her split from Channing Tatum, Jenna explained Steve reached out to her.

'He was like, "I never forgot meeting you." That was a really cool moment. Like I say all the time, "The universe works in very mysterious wonderful ways."'

Jenna is also currently promoting her tell-all book Gracefully You: Finding Beauty And Balance.

Style savvy: The plunging number perfectly showed off her sensational decolletage and she boosted her height in a pair of strappy black heels

She dished about the reasons she and Channing, called it quits after nine years of marriage.

In the book she writes: 'First and foremost I had to accept the realization this isn't working and had moved into hurting.'

She added: 'I'd come to realize the dynamic I was in wasn't serving me nor was it serving my daughter.' The couple share Everly, six.

They had, in fact, decided to separate three months before their shock announcement stunned their millions of social media fans back in April 2018.

Channing has now moved on and is dating British singer, Jessie J, 31.
description: Pregnant Jenna Dewan, 39, looked absolutely glowing as she attended the TheWrap's Power Women Summit at Fairmont Miramar Hotel in Santa Monica on Friday.
